channel.title: Screen goes white
channel.description:
sometimes when I go to certain areas like when I walked to barrows once to get the coords cuz i needed to make a tele and there wasn't one, my screen just went all white and it said in the command prompt somethin bout shutdown. So i have to restart the whole client and the same thing will happen again, it happens in several places, how can I fix this?
P.S.Idk if it makes a diff but its a client for a 508 server.

item.title: Screen goes white
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

99range k0:

thnx, what particular area of the forums would they be in?

The Client Hacking section.

Read full topic

item.title: Screen goes white
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

You most likely don’t have the mapdata for the areas that make your client crash; search around the forums to see if you can find mapdata for those areas ;).

Read full topic
